entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023
